channel.title: Blog on Rob Schley
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Rob Schley

item.title: The Cobbler's Children
item.description: The trope of the Cobbler’s children having no shoes seems appropriate here. I’ve been a professional software developer for 12 years and I’ve never had a personal website… until now. It is also interesting how little personal code I have on GitHub and other repositories. The sad truth is that most of the software I’ve built since Joomla has been entirely proprietary. And, even worse, many of the apps and sites I’ve worked on, no longer exist.
